## Features

- ü©µ **Open API Platform** - Provides free, fast-response, stable online API services ready to use
- üåê **Global CDN Distribution** - API requests arrive quickly with low latency
- üî• **High Performance** - Pursuing ultimate performance and high code quality
- üî® **Modern Toolchain** - Project integrates various modern cutting-edge tool technology stacks
- üí™üèª **Secure & Reliable** - Uses CI/CD related security tool integration with regular security audits

## Quick Start

Just a few steps to get you started locally, access address: `http://localhost:6789`

```bash
# Clone the project
git clone https://github.com/oljc/apiup.git
cd apiup

# Install dependencies
bun install

# Start service
bun run dev
```
